casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Jimmy McNEILL. No. 615A03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2005. John Watters, Special Deputy Attorney General, Kristy M. Newton, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of April 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

*316"Motion Allowed. Defendant (McNeill) shall have up to and including the 6th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of April 2005."
